channel.title: Run.bat Error!
channel.description:
When I want to login someone's client, I cant get on because there is a run.bat error. When I click "Run.bat" a error message comes up saying, [code]"Java" is not reconized as a internal, external, operatble, or batch command.[/code]
Please help me!, and if you flame me about not setting my enviormental values, I set them perfectl, so dont flame me :)

item.title: Run.bat Error!

item.description:
@Coder-Omar wrote:

How do you change it to javac?

Read full topic
